content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court decided to divide the property equally between the claimant and the defendant in a matrimonial property case the claimant was awarded half of the land half of the apartment and half of the personal property the defendant was also awarded half of the land half of the apartment and half of the land the text also mentions that the case involves a divorce between two parties referred to as sm and km the applicant is seeking the dissolution of the marriage periodic payments for their minor son specific arrangements for the mothers access to the child division of property and recognition of joint debts the defendant disagrees with some of the applicants claims and has filed a counterclaim requesting specific arrangements for the fathers access to the child and disagreeing with the claims regarding debts and property division the court will make a decision on these matters and determine the amount of child maintenance to be paid the text also mentions that the applicant is granted the right to private ownership of certain assets including an apartment and a plot of land and the defendant is entitled to a portion of these assets both parties are ordered to pay state stamp duty and costs incurred and the state budget for the costs of serving procedural documents

metadata.cost: 394 EUR (stamp duty) + 1'300 EUR (legal fees) by the defendant,  482.50 EUR (stamp duty) + 3'606.99 (legal fees) + 15.22 (court fees) by the applicant
